alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:21PM EDT until July 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 521 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Marianna to 13 miles northwest of Blountstown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Cottondale, Altha, Alford, Ocheesee, Kynesville, Union City, Henderson Mill, Steele City, Sink Creek, Star, Simsville, Cottondale Airport, Alliance and Torreya State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
